newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cascade rating lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cascade rating lowered.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it lowered its intermediate rating on Cascade Corp to underperform from market performer, citing lower fundamental growth and a lower expected return for the stock.
-- EVEREN, noting Cascade's below-consensus Q2 earnings of $0.37 a share, reduced its EPS estimate to $1.50 from $1.66 for FY97 and to $1.45 from $1.62 for FY98.
-- For the long-term, EVEREN maintains a market performer rating on the stock.
